title: PSG win 2-1 at Barcelona in Champions League
subhead: Barcelona and PSG have not been on the best of terms over the past decade, with the Catalans recording one of the greatest comebacks in the history of the game in 2017 with a 6-1 win over the Parisians. On Wednesday, however, PSG's Gonçalo Ramos scored a last-minute goal to clinch the victory at Olympic Stadium in Barcelona.

title: Five fun ways to discover Paris and its surroundings with your family
subhead: See the Eiffel Tower from a hot air balloon, take a bus that plunges into the Seine, or ride down the Champs-Elysées in a tuk-tuk: the metro is far from the only way to explore the capital and its surroundings with joy.

title: The UK's flag movement fuels tensions amid the far right's rise
subhead: The phenomenon of British towns flying the Union Jack and Saint George's Cross has emerged in a context of radicalization among a part of the public, intensified by social media and reactionary media outlets.

title: 'Zucman tax': The great fear of France's ultra-rich
